Class SmartPlayer

java.lang.Object
  Player
      SmartPlayer

public class SmartPlayer
extends Player

SmartPlayer evaluates possible moves of both itself and its opponent in order to make the best move for itself.

Version:
May 3, 2017
Author:
Alex Yu
